property.name: text
property.value: Parallel Signal Processing: Behavioral Logic: Computes Rolling Mean & Std Dev over time windows. Safety Logic: Computes Instantaneous Acceleration Magnitude to detect high-impact anomalies (> 20).

property.name: text
property.value: System Overview: This CPS monitors driving behavior using smartphone sensor data (Accelerometer & Gyroscope). It processes raw signals to extract statistical features, applies Decision Tree logic to classify driving styles (Slow, Normal, Aggressive), detect accidents and manages real-time states via a Finite State Machine.

property.name: _type
property.value: [AccX=double, AccY=double, AccZ=double, GyroX=double, GyroY=double, GyroZ=double, Class=string]

property.name: text
text
text
text
property.value: Decision Tree Logic Implementation: This subsystem executes the rules extracted from the machine learning model. It evaluates the input feature vector against specific thresholds (e.g., AccY_std <= 0.85) using parallel Boolean guards to determine the driving state.

property.name: text
property.value:
Finite State Machine (FSM) Logic:
Init Phase: Buffers the first 50 samples (Window Size) to prevent invalid readings during startup.
Run Loop: Dynamically switches between Slow, Normal, and Aggressive based on classifier output.
Safety Override: Transitions to the Accident state immediately upon detection, overriding all other behaviors.
